website_summaries.verdict: The JVC Marshmallow headphones are an exceptional value thanks to an ultralow price tag combined with solid audio quality, noise isolation capability, and a secure fit.
pros: The JVC Marshmallow headphones are very inexpensive
They offer a secure, comfortable fit and good audio quality
They come in a wide variety of colors to match any recent iPod Nano
cons: The top part of the cable seems fragile, and the shallow earpiece design may not work for all users

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These were my favorite earbuds for a long time, but somehow the bass doesn't sound that great this time around. I don't know if it is because I have been using other headsets and hadn't noticed but I feel like the quality used to be better and louder. I love the memory foam earbuds because my earholes are small and they provide a snug fit but I never felt like I was compromising on sound quality before. I hope they go back to making these the way they used to!
customer_reviews.author: Ady Loza

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ear buds of all time
customer_reviews.text: My favorite ear buds of all time, have been using these for over 8 years. I have small ears and these fit perfectly and the sound quality is very decent for a pair of ear buds, good bass sounds. Comes with different sized cushions. The mic is good quality for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McCarn

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, Solid Sound!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable to wear for long periods. I usually sleep with them on and they don't bother my ears at all. I have tried other types and while they might be comfortable, they just don't hold up. The pair I'm using now are close to a year old, the most I've gotten from other head phones is a month or two. My whole family is using the and they consistently perform well. We use the with our iPhones, iPads without issue. In general they sound very good. They don't have the best bass but (in iOS) if you set the equalizer to treble reducer it makes them sounds lot better.
customer_reviews.author: GeneralError

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Perfect Buds for my Ears
customer_reviews.text: My ears are very picky when it comes to earbuds. Can't have anything too large, must be soft, sound quality must be on par, and be comfortable to wear in bed or out. I've tried how many pairs but never had any that was perfect, and then when I came across these I remembered I had them in high school. Haven't seen them around since until now and immediately grabbed them! My ears love them!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Martin

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great...
customer_reviews.text: In order to hear well I have to turn the volume almost up to the "dangerous" setting when my phone tells me listening at that volume could affect my hearing :/ I'm not sure if it's my phone or the headphone quality itself. I don't have hearing problems. The noise canceling is pretty non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: FizzyCat

customer_reviews.title: these are fake jvc headphones, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: the sound quality sucks at higher volume indicating lower quality woofers used. Look for GUMY not marshmallow if you want the old style. (Walgreens sells the real GUMY headphones, go there)
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Love these - buying more
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these years ago at a CVS. I used them for 4 years until they broke. I think that's a decent lifespan for $10 ear buds. They are perfect for what they are, I use these for my laptop and for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chambana

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of headphones at the dollar store prior to buying these and honestly I can't tell you how much of a waste that was. I like the foam tips as opposed to the rubber ones. They are good at blocking outside noise due to the foam tips. The wires are pretty long in comparison to the other cheap headphones. If I ever need to buy more cheap headphones I know where to get them. These will be my go to. Sound is actually pretty loud and clear for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Glendenning

customer_reviews.title: I've Loved these headphones for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I've Loved these headphones for a long time. The built-in microphone allows me to be hands free on my phone while driving and still hear my conversation. I hate phone's on speaker phone! It's also great while listening to a podcast and you can click to pause the episode if you need to without having to have your device handy. Plus the ear buds are comfy and conform to my ears and block out all extra noise.
customer_reviews.author: Grubski

customer_reviews.title: Shocked my ear within a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased JVC marshmallow headphones since I was a freshman in college (7 years ago). Over time, I've noticed they last less than the first time I purchased, especially with the addition of the mic. This might have to be my final time buying these because this fizzled and shocked my ear while I was using them after only three weeks of using them. Painful and dangerous! Don't buy these if you care about your health!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds for tiny eared freaks like me.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earbuds for people with small ears. I have trouble with silicone ear buds, because while silicone is soft, it's not as flexible as foam. I have never been able to wear a hard plastic earbud. They hurt or fall out! Where are my tiny eared people at? Do you know this pain? These are my favorite earbud style headphones because I have very small ears and have a very hard time finding ear buds that fit or don't hurt. The buds are made with foam that is both accommodating to the shape of your ears, but firm enough to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wounds caused by these, but the same company has better ones.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the earbuds themselves were bulbous. This caused abrasion wounds in my ears. Their memory foam ones are much better. Streamlined so they don't cause wounds.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Frazier Bitter

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, not as comfy as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a SUPER comfy pair of ear buds... I must have super sensitive ears because even these cushy things bother me after wearing a while. I still use them and they sound amazing, I just have to take them out after a while as my ears get soar from the pressure. And no, I'm not shoving them in too deep.
customer_reviews.author: strubmama

customer_reviews.title: hope they all work as well as mine have
customer_reviews.text: five stars because it works well and a very good price. i use these daily for hours when i game. the mic and heafphones have worked thus far for many months. i would order again. the only problem is they arent some extremely nice headphones but i just hope they work as well in future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: gonzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I honestly seek these earbuds out above anything else. The quality is decent and the build quality is nice. The marshmallow design is absolutely fantastic. It's super comfortable, and stays in the ear no matter what. Plus it blocks out outside sounds quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite headphones
customer_reviews.text: they stopped selling marshmallow headphones like these in stores so i turned to amazon, the quality is just as perfect 💞
customer_reviews.author: Lillith Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I like the way that I'm able to put the earbuds in my ear and doesn't hurt
customer_reviews.author: Gina Chimilio

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: I love how this is can get very loud. It’s comfortable and sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones and I will continue to order them. The noise cancelling feature is amazing and the mic work well. Wish you could control the volumn on the mic button too though. They are amazing nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Iam_BRE

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds! I had some for years before I lost the marshmallow ear pieces so I bought the exact same pair.
customer_reviews.author: ScarlettRed

customer_reviews.title: Good Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are good earbuds. They stay in place while I drive. The mic is clear and the sound is good. I purchased another pair to leave in the car and this one from my purse. Can't beat them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite ear buds and I have a few in different colors. Great sound at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallow Earbuds are great for tiny ears
customer_reviews.text: Marshmallow Earbuds are great for tiny ears!! My daughter is very petite and has the worst time finding earbuds that won't fall out or hurt. These did the trick and a great price for teenage use!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girls for Christmas. They love the comfort and price
customer_reviews.author: hazel thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love💞
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing little headphones, perfect 11$ pricing! These were once given to me and lasted me a year but I really like these because of the marshmallow foam earpieces
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I go through 1 or 2 of these a year because I use them daily and I'm kind of careless with them. I only use this specific kind. They are comfortable, cheap, and sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. these lasted for maybe 5month and then stopped working
customer_reviews.author: texas12345

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY corded earbuds I'd ever use
customer_reviews.text: Nice headset. The marshmallow are the ONLY corded earbuds I'd ever buy
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Jones

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this brand of headphones. Walmart sells them for 15, but I always find them for cheaper on Amazon. Awesome sound in my opinion. I'm faithful to the MARSHMALLOW brand.
customer_reviews.author: salamoalekom

customer_reviews.title: It broke in less than 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Not very good.. the sound went bad after just one month.. you could no longer hear very clear..
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Ureña

customer_reviews.title: Soundblocking and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds. Fully block out sound and extremely comfortable. Just wish I had more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Malatzky

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchasing it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the second time. i love them. i take off the earbuds tho, my ears are way too small so i use it without any padding and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: vonniezee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked these ear buds. They fit good in my ears and the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Good buds
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for buds I don't wear them, wife and kids like They like the foam instead of silicone
customer_reviews.author: David McGee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are loved very much! They fit and sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Bad ECHO
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 pairs. Both have a horrible echo.
customer_reviews.author: larsen1013

customer_reviews.title: While i really like the older version I have of the Marshmallow earbuds
customer_reviews.text: While i really like the older version I have of the Marshmallow earbuds, these ones sound cheaper. They put off a tin sound that effects my enjoyment, but I bought them for cheap so i can't complain too much. I'll just keep using my old ones until they break.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine but it had a sticky
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but it had a sticky, oily substance covering the plastic wrapping and it smelled like automotive oil or chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: William Lowe

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD GIVE ZERO STARS IF I COULD. I HAVENT HAD THESE NOT EVEN FOR A MONTH AND BOTH OR THE EARBUDS BLEW! I DONT EVEN PLAY LOUD MUSIC. WORST EVER. 0/10. WOULD NEVER BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: k harris

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Good while they worked; broke almost immediately. Not a frugal choice for rough handlers or constant use. Mic held up longest.
customer_reviews.author: mistressmary

customer_reviews.title: Nice bugdet earphones
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a good pair of earphones without breaking the bank, these are it. Sound quality is great, the in ear cushions are made out of memory foam so they are very comfortable to wear. These are definitely comparable in quality to more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Annette G.

product_meta.title: JVC HAFR37P Marshmallow Earbuds with Mic, Pink
product_meta.description: Color:Pink| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe new JVC HA-FR37 Marshmallow inner-ear headphones include a built-in mic/remote for use with many popular smart phones & tablets. They feature a secure and comfortable-fitting body with small and medium memory foam earpieces to provide superior sound isolation from background sound. Large 11mm driver units with powerful neodymium magnets deliver crisp sound. Eight vibrant colors insure the perfect look. It comes with a 3.9-foot (1.2m) cord with a gold-plated iPhone-compatible plug.
feature_bullets: Comfortable and secure-fit inner-ear headphones with soft memory foam earpieces and just-fit body
Superior sound isolation from background sound with memory foam earpieces
3.94ft (1.2m) color cord with gold-plated iPhone compatible slim plug
S / M color memory foam earpieces included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars675 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
